alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 2:37PM EDT until July 16 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Central Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/. * At 237 PM EDT/137 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Blountstown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, Blountstown, Bainbridge, Midway, Florida A and M, Cairo, Whigham, Doak Campbell Stadium, Chattahoochee, Greensboro, West Bainbridge, Sneads, Gretna, Bristol and Grand Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
